summary: A video featuring Ryan Van Duzer expressing his love for e-bikes and their positive impact on his life and society.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design, speaking and gesturing with his hands. The room is filled with various items, including a computer monitor displaying a scenic landscape, a wooden dresser, and a desk with a chair. The man appears to be explaining something, as indicated by his hand movements and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to an outdoor setting, showing a person standing triumphantly on a rocky terrain with arms raised, overlooking a vast landscape with mountains in the background. The next scene features a cyclist riding on a narrow road surrounded by dense green forests, captured from an aerial perspective. The video then shifts to another outdoor scene where a person stands on a rocky outcrop with arms raised, facing a cityscape in the distance, with the sky tinted in a reddish hue, possibly indicating a sunrise or sunset. The video returns to the man in the room, continuing his explanation, with the Instagram handle '@DUZER' displayed on the screen, suggesting a social media context. The man continues to speak and gesture, maintaining the same background and setting throughout the video.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with someone saying, "When I see someone on an e-bike, I think, one less car on the roads and one more person enjoying the outside world." This statement is delivered in an enthusiastic tone. Upbeat electronic music then begins, transitioning to a male voice that enthusiastically says, "Hey, my name is Ryan Van Duzer, and I love my e-bike," followed by a whooping sound.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a gray t-shirt with an American flag design, speaking directly to the camera. The room is decorated with various items, including a computer monitor displaying a scenic landscape, a desk with a speaker, and a wooden dresser with stickers. The Instagram handle '@DUZER' is visible in the top left corner. The scene transitions to a close-up of a bicycle's front wheel moving along a paved path, followed by a view of a black bag attached to the bicycle's rear rack, filled with groceries such as bananas, Silk Almond milk, apples, and a water bottle. The man continues speaking in the room, gesturing with his hands. The video then shifts to an outdoor setting, showing a group of cyclists riding on a path surrounded by greenery. The cyclists are wearing helmets and casual cycling attire, with one cyclist in the foreground wearing a blue shirt and an orange helmet. The video captures the cyclists riding through a scenic landscape with open fields and distant mountains under a clear blue sky. The video concludes with the man in the room, still speaking to the camera, with the same background elements visible.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker explaining that bikes have always been his main form of transportation. He speaks in a conversational tone and continues by giving examples of when and why he rides. Then, he asks why he would need an e-bike, given that he runs ultramarathons and bikes thousands of miles, stating that he did not think he wanted one. A few years ago, he got his mom an e-bike and it changed her world. Her e-bike gave her confidence and ability to ride longer distances, go on errands, and ride with him. The audio transitions into a cheerful, upbeat, European-style song, with the chorus vocalizing "Olay" while instruments include brass.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design, speaking directly to the camera. The room is filled with various items, including a computer monitor displaying a scenic landscape, a wooden dresser, and a desk with a speaker and other objects. The man gestures with his hands as he talks, indicating he is explaining or discussing something. The scene then transitions to an outdoor setting where two people are riding bicycles on a dirt path. Both are wearing helmets; one has a blue helmet and a light blue t-shirt, while the other has an orange helmet and a blue t-shirt. They appear to be enjoying a sunny day, with a clear blue sky and green fields in the background. The video then returns to the man in the room, continuing his discussion, with the same background elements visible. The man's expressions and gestures suggest he is engaged in a detailed conversation or presentation. The video maintains a consistent focus on the man's upper body and the room's details, emphasizing his points with hand movements. The overall atmosphere is casual and informative, with the man providing insights or information in a relaxed setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker enthusiastically stating, "now it's something that we can share together, and that is awesome". This transitions to a lighter, more casual dialogue between what sounds like a mother and son on their adventure. The male speaker says, "Out in nature with mom", followed by the mother's agreement. The son adds, "Pretty good deal out here" while the mother says "Having a nice day." The clip moves to a single male speaker who states, "I'd always looked at bikes as a way to get lots of exercise, and to push my physical limits, and e-bikes seemed to take all that away."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design, speaking directly to the camera. The room is decorated with a computer monitor displaying a scenic landscape, a wooden dresser, and a wall adorned with a flag. The scene transitions to an outdoor setting where a group of cyclists rides along a path through a lush green field, with purple flowers in the foreground and a clear blue sky overhead. The video then returns to the man in the room, who continues to speak, gesturing with his hands. The scene shifts to a first-person perspective of a cyclist riding down a suburban street, with a yellow duck wearing an American flag helmet attached to the handlebars. The video alternates between the man speaking in the room and the cyclist riding through various suburban streets, passing houses, trees, and street signs. The man continues to speak, occasionally gesturing, while the background on the computer monitor changes to different scenic images. The video concludes with the man still speaking in the room, maintaining the same background elements throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: A male speaker discusses electric bikes, explaining how "they're an efficient and eco-friendly way to get around town while still getting exercise." He further states, "They don't burn gas, which saves you money and is good for the environment." He says he was inspired by his mom to get an e-bike which he has used for a year now. He states that he primarily uses standard bikes but that his e-bike "comes in very handy, like when I'm tired" or in other such situations. A brief whooshing sound effect is played at one point. The speaker then mentions being "in a hurry and don't want to be super sweaty" before reaching his destination.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design, seated in a room with a computer setup in the background. He is actively gesturing with his hands while speaking, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The room is well-lit, with a desk, computer monitor, and various items scattered around, creating a casual and personal atmosphere. The man's expressions and hand movements suggest he is explaining or emphasizing points. The scene transitions to a close-up of the man, focusing on his upper body and face, with the background slightly blurred, maintaining the same room setting. The video then shifts to an outdoor scene where the man is wearing a helmet with an American flag design, riding a skateboard on a paved surface, showcasing his active lifestyle. The video returns to the indoor setting, with the man continuing to speak and gesture, reinforcing the continuity of his presentation or conversation. The overall atmosphere is casual and engaging, with the man's attire and actions reflecting a blend of personal and active elements.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker stating "and sometimes I ride it just to have fun," describing something as a "smile inducing joy machine." He then whoops loudly. Next, he expresses that someone wants to see his bike and suggests to "check it out." Finally, there is a distinct vehicle sound, which is the sound of a car.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a white electric bicycle parked inside a cozy, well-lit apartment. The bike, featuring a water bottle holder and a small bag attached to the handlebars, is positioned near a kitchen area with wooden cabinets, a refrigerator adorned with magnets and photos, and a green couch. A person's hand points towards the bike, highlighting its features. The camera pans around the bike, capturing its sleek design and the surrounding living space, which includes a wooden coffee table with magazines and a small wooden shelf with various items. The atmosphere is casual and inviting, with natural light streaming in from a window, creating a warm and comfortable environment. The video emphasizes the bike's modern design and its integration into the home setting, suggesting a lifestyle that combines urban living with eco-friendly transportation.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker proudly presenting "the priority current," characterizing it as the centerpiece of his apartment. He shifts to a descriptive tone, explaining how the bike is designed like a "traditional commuter-style bike," emphasizing its upright, comfortable nature for city riding. He points out the hidden battery, integrated into the downtube for a sleek look.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a white bicycle with a water bottle attached to its frame, situated in a room with a couch and a refrigerator in the background. A person's hand points to the motor, which is located near the pedal area, and the text "THE MOTOR IS HERE" appears on the screen, indicating the motor's position. The camera then zooms in on the motor and the belt system, highlighting the intricate details of the belt and its connection to the motor. The person's hand is seen adjusting the belt, ensuring it is properly aligned and tensioned. The video concludes with a wider shot of the bicycle, showing the entire belt system and the motor, with the person's hand pointing to the motor once again, emphasizing its importance in the bicycle's operation. The setting remains consistent throughout the video, with the room's interior providing a backdrop to the detailed examination of the bicycle's motor and belt system.
events_list.audio_caption: A male speaker describes the features of a bike, focusing on its "low-maintenance drivetrain." He highlights the Gates Carbon Drive, noting it is longer-lasting and quieter than a standard chain. The speaker then focuses on the internal gearing as being enclosed and protected from the elements. He characterizes this as the bedrock of all Priority bikes, emphasizing the low-maintenance aspect.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a white bicycle with a black seat and a water bottle holder, set in a room with a blue wall and various items scattered around. The camera pans around the bike, highlighting its features such as the rear light, pedals, and the digital display on the handlebars, which shows the speed and distance traveled. A hand is seen interacting with the display, pressing buttons to navigate through the settings. The display reads "00.0 mph" and "952.4 miles," indicating the bike's current speed and total distance covered. The video also features a yellow duck-shaped bell with an American flag design attached to the handlebars, adding a playful touch to the bike. The overall atmosphere is casual and informative, focusing on the bike's features and functionality.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with someone describing features typical of city-type commuter bikes, noting the presence of fenders, lights on the front and rear, and a "cushy gel seat". The speaker mentions that e-bikes usually have a screen on the handlebars to display important information and details how to adjust the speed and check the battery level on this bike. The speaker mentions that it is useful to have some sort of a noisemaker on the bike such as a bell so people know when they're passing them. Then, a bicycle bell rings. The clip features a single male speaker with a conversational tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a person's hand adjusting a black gear shifter on a bicycle, marked with a "+" and "5" symbol, indicating the gear level. The hand rotates the shifter, changing the gear settings. The scene transitions to a view of the bicycle's rear wheel and gear mechanism, showcasing the chain and gears in motion. The focus then shifts to a black power adapter labeled "D-POWER" on a carpeted floor, with a hand pointing towards it, suggesting its importance. The video continues with a close-up of the bicycle's white frame, where a hand is seen plugging a black cable into a port on the frame, likely for charging or powering the bike's electronic components. The final scene shows the bicycle's front section, including the handlebars, a water bottle in a holder, and the front wheel, with the background revealing a room with a couch and various items, indicating an indoor setting. The video effectively demonstrates the process of adjusting the bicycle's gear settings and connecting the power adapter, providing a comprehensive look at the bike's features and functionality.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker describing a bicycle's Shimano Nexus gearing system and how to use it, stating that gear changes happen within the hub, adding, "it's magic and it's awesome". He continues describing the charging system of e-bikes, mentioning plugging it into the battery and removing the battery if desired, stating that, "it usually just takes a few hours to get a full charge". The speaker concludes by identifying the bike as, "the priority current". The speaker has a casual and informative tone.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design is seated in a room with a blue wall and a window on the right side. Behind him, a desk with a computer monitor displaying a nature scene, a printer, and various items can be seen. The man is actively gesturing with his hands while speaking, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The room is decorated with a Colorado flag on the wall and a calendar, adding a personal touch to the setting. The atmosphere appears casual and focused, with the man's expressive hand movements emphasizing his points. The video captures the man's dynamic interaction with the audience, maintaining a consistent and engaging presence throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker with a casual tone making a point about e-bikes. He presents the argument that they are only cheating in certain circumstances and questions the logic of considering them as such. A brief whistle sound interjects, adding a lighthearted touch. He then continues, admitting he initially thought e-bikes would reduce exercise but mentions research showing the opposite, using his mother as an example. The speaker sounds convinced and shares this information in an informative tone. Throughout the clip, there is some low-level ambient noise.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a cyclist riding on a dirt path surrounded by lush greenery, wearing a helmet and a light blue shirt, with a black and green bag attached to the back of the bike. The scene transitions to an indoor setting where a man in a gray t-shirt with an American flag design is seated in front of a computer monitor displaying a colorful image. The room is decorated with various items, including a wooden dresser, a desk with a computer, and a wall adorned with stickers and a framed picture. The man appears to be speaking, using hand gestures to emphasize his points. The video alternates between the outdoor cycling scene and the indoor setting, showing the man continuing to speak and gesture, with the background remaining consistent. The video concludes with the man still seated in front of the computer monitor, maintaining the same setting and attire.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker emphasizing that "pedal-assisted exercise is still better than no exercise." He continues in an enthusiastic tone, stating e-bikes are a gateway to more riding, eliminating excuses and recalling stories of people returning to cycling after many years, then choosing bikes over cars, calling it "awesome." After a brief pause, the audio transitions to a whimsical "Wee!" sound effect.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design. He is speaking and gesturing with his hands, indicating he is explaining something. The room is decorated with various items, including a computer monitor displaying a colorful image, a wooden dresser, and a white storage unit with stickers. The scene then transitions to an outdoor setting where a person is riding a bicycle. The rider is wearing a helmet with an American flag design and is seen from a first-person perspective, showing the handlebars and the road ahead. The video then returns to the man in the room, continuing his explanation with hand gestures. The video concludes with the man still speaking and gesturing, maintaining the same background and setting throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a male speaker discussing exercise and e-bikes, emphasizing pedal-assist models and the flexibility to adjust the level of assistance for varying workout intensity. He mentions using turbo speed and pedaling "like a madman" to maintain maximum speed. The clip concludes with a cat's meow.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man riding a bicycle down a street lined with parked cars and trees, wearing a helmet and casual attire. The scene transitions to an indoor setting where the same man, now seated at a desk, is speaking and gesturing with his hands. He is wearing a light-colored t-shirt with an American flag design. The background features a computer monitor displaying various images, a wooden dresser, and a wall adorned with a decorative piece. The man appears to be engaged in a conversation or presentation, as indicated by his expressive hand movements and focused demeanor. The video maintains a consistent indoor environment throughout, with the man continuing to speak and gesture, suggesting an ongoing discussion or explanation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with the sound of dinging. A male speaker then provides "nerdy e-bike info," distinguishing between class 1, class 2, and class 3 e-bikes in a casual tone. He mentions e-bikes with throttles and their role in getting people out of cars.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man sitting in a room, wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design, speaking and gesturing with his hands. The room is decorated with a computer monitor displaying a colorful image, a wooden dresser, and a white storage unit with various stickers. The scene transitions to an outdoor setting where a person rides a bicycle down a suburban street, wearing a helmet with an American flag design and a yellow duck-shaped handlebar accessory. The cyclist's speedometer shows a trip distance of 952.4 miles. The video then returns to the man in the room, continuing his discussion. The final scene shows the cyclist riding through a residential area, passing parked cars and houses, with a clear blue sky overhead. The video captures a blend of indoor and outdoor activities, emphasizing the cyclist's journey and the man's commentary.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a single male speaker, emphasizing that "every state or country has different regulations on where you can ride your bikes." He continues in an informative tone, mentioning his e-bike being a class 3, usually keeping it around "15 to 20 miles per hour." A brief "yeah" sound effect interjects, before the speaker acknowledges that e-bikes "can be expensive."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man wearing a gray t-shirt with an American flag design, seated in a room with a computer setup behind him. He is actively gesturing with his hands while speaking, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The room is decorated with various items, including a wooden dresser, a whiteboard with colorful magnets, and a wall-mounted TV. The computer monitor displays a vibrant, nature-themed wallpaper, and a Colorado flag is visible on the wall behind him. The scene transitions to an outdoor setting, showing a street lined with trees and parked cars. A cyclist wearing a helmet and casual attire rides along the street, passing by a stop sign and a blue street sign that reads '1st St.' The atmosphere is sunny and clear, with a peaceful suburban environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a single male speaker stating that you have to spend about 1500 for "a good entry level bike," while mentioning that his bike is worth around 3000 but "prices are coming down," especially in cities like Denver, where "e-bike rebates" are offered. His tone is friendly and informative. Following the speech is a lighthearted, short snippet of humming with a "la la la" sound.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man wearing a gray t-shirt with an American flag design, seated in a room with a computer setup in the background. He is actively gesturing with his hands while speaking, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or presentation. The room is decorated with various items, including a wooden dresser, a whiteboard, and a colorful wall hanging. The computer screen displays a nature-themed wallpaper, adding a touch of vibrancy to the setting. The man's expressions and hand movements suggest he is explaining or emphasizing points during his discussion. The video transitions to an outdoor scene where a group of cyclists is riding on a road surrounded by green fields and a clear blue sky, showcasing a serene and picturesque environment. The cyclists are wearing helmets and cycling gear, indicating they are engaged in a recreational activity. The video then returns to the indoor setting, where the man continues his discussion, maintaining the same background elements and attire. The overall atmosphere of the video is casual and informative, with a blend of indoor and outdoor scenes that complement the narrative.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker who is excited about e-bike technology, noting their increasing efficiency and comfort. He then emphasizes the joy of riding and how it reminds him of the "incredible sense of freedom" he experienced as a child. Suddenly, a short, playful musical jingle begins, accompanied by a second male voice singing "freedom, freedom, freedom is the coolest." The tone shifts to more upbeat and enthusiastic.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a bustling scene on a bridge in Paris, where numerous cyclists ride past the iconic Eiffel Tower, surrounded by pedestrians and classic street lamps. The atmosphere is lively, with clear skies and a vibrant cityscape in the background. The scene transitions to a different city, likely Amsterdam, where a long row of bicycles is parked along a bike path, with people walking and cycling in the background, showcasing the city's bike-friendly culture. The next scene shifts to a busy urban street in New York City, where cyclists navigate through traffic, wearing helmets and winter clothing, indicating a colder season. The video then focuses on a close-up of a white B-Cycle electric bike, highlighting its design and branding, followed by a row of similar bikes parked at a docking station, emphasizing the city's bike-sharing program. The narrative then moves indoors to a man sitting in a room, wearing a t-shirt with an American flag design, gesturing as he speaks. The room is decorated with a colorful wall hanging, a computer monitor displaying a scenic image, and various personal items, creating a casual and personal atmosphere. The video concludes with the man continuing to speak, with the Instagram handle '@DUZER' appearing on the screen, indicating his social media presence.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker advocating for bicycles in cities, describing their benefits to healthy communities and improved infrastructure. He mentions bike share programs with e-bikes in Boulder, expressing his belief that "the world will be a better place with more people on bikes and less people in cars." The speaker's tone is enthusiastic and persuasive throughout his speech.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a white t-shirt with an American flag design is seated in a room, speaking directly to the camera. The room is decorated with a wooden dresser, a desk with a computer monitor displaying a nature scene, and a wall adorned with a Colorado flag. The man gestures with his hands as he talks, emphasizing his points. The Instagram handle '@DUZER' is visible in the top left corner of the screen. The atmosphere is casual and informative, with the man appearing engaged and animated in his discussion. The background remains consistent throughout the video, with the Colorado flag and nature scene on the monitor providing a colorful backdrop to the man's presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a man speaking, thanking viewers for watching and encouraging them to ask questions in the comments. He poses an example question about kids riding e-bikes, stating that he thinks "kids should probably be riding normal bikes, because they need the exercise." He then thanks viewers again, encouraging them to check out other videos, like, subscribe, and share. The speaker concludes by thanking the audience again. Following this, a distinct bird chirping sound is heard.
